reviewText: This dvd is easy to follow.  He breaks down each move step by step.  There is also a reverse view so you can follow him at the end of each section.  I have learned the first part of this form from Chen Zhenglei's dvd.  It's a good way to start if you don't have a local teacher, I know it takes a long time to understand the moves on a deeper level but these dvd's give you the opportunity to start studying with a master of Taijiquan.
